name: Multi Currency Lite For WooCommerce
author: WpExperts Hub

sections.description:
• Display price switcher dropdown in menu.
  • Allows your customer to switch prices in different currencies.
  • Allow you to accept payments in multiple currencies.
  • Update currency rates on daily basis.
  • you can choose fixed manual rates or auto updated rates.

  • No need to set up anything extra, it will auto convert your shipping, Taxes and everything in selected currency.

  • Get Woocommerce Multi Currency Pro:

Acknowledgements

Thanks to every donor, supporter, and bug reporter!

License

This plugin is Free Software, released and licensed under the GPL, version 3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate Multi Currency Lite For WooCommerce.
  2. Navigate Multi Currency page(Woocommerce >> Multi Currency).
  3. Api Key from https://apilayer.com and save settings.
  4. Add currencies using “Add New Currency” button.
  5. Use “Update Rates” button to update currency rates.
  6. Go to Appearance >> Menus and add Currency switcher to your menu where you want to display currency switcher.
sections.faq:
having issue or need help with Multi Currency Lite For WooCommerce plugin ?

please use the [WordPress Support Forums].

Support?

For support questions, bug reports, or feature requests, please use the [WordPress Support Forums]. Thank you!

Requirements?

In short: WordPress 5.4 or higher, while the latest version of WordPress is always recommended.
